name: VZMacMachineIdentifier
desc: A unique identifier for a VM.

items.name: init?(dataRepresentation: Data)
items.desc: Create a machine identifier described by the specified data representation.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a new unique machine identifier.

items.name: var dataRepresentation: Data
items.desc: Returns the opaque data representation of the machine identifier.
